scripts.deploy:pages: npm run build -w apps/k-maps && rm -rf apps/k-maps/dist/k-maps/browser/functions && cp -R api apps/k-maps/dist/k-maps/browser/functions && npx wrangler pages deploy apps/k-maps/dist/k-maps/browser --project-name k-maps --branch main
scripts.deploy:ionic: npm run build -w apps/app-k-maps && npx wrangler pages deploy apps/app-k-maps/www --project-name app-k-maps --branch main
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:pages && npm run deploy:ionic
